original_text: Job says, “If anyone tries to please God, it does not help them at all.” Job says, “If anyone tries to please God, it does not help them at all.” Job says, “If anyone tries to please God,

sentences.korean_translation: 만약 누가 하나님을 기쁘시게 하려고 한다면
